/// A simple function that takes no arguments and
/// returns no results.
///
#[inline]
pub fn simple_syscall() -> MessageType {
    let sys = Syscalls::SimpleSyscall.as_u64() as usize;
    let (result1, _) = unsafe { syscall0(sys) };
    MessageType::from_u16(result1 as u16).expect("invalid MessageType")
}
